CustomField.formula: IF( (LimitsAggregateQueriesUsed__c / LimitsAggregateQueriesMax__c * 100) >= 90, "⛔", IF( (LimitsAggregateQueriesUsed__c / LimitsAggregateQueriesMax__c * 100) < 90 && (LimitsAggregateQueriesUsed__c / LimitsAggregateQueriesMax__c * 100) >= 80, "⚠️", "✅" ) ) + ' ' + TEXT(LimitsAggregateQueriesUsed__c ) + ' / ' + TEXT(LimitsAggregateQueriesMax__c ) + ' (' + TEXT(ROUND(LimitsAggregateQueriesUsed__c / LimitsAggregateQueriesMax__c * 100, 2)) + '%)'
CustomField.label: Aggregate Queries
